00060   int  g_delay = 0;
00061   bool g_verbose = false;
00062   const int DEFAULT_PORT = 11255;
00063   const char *usage[] = {
00064     "usage: sampleServer [OPTIONS]",
00065     "",
00066     "OPTIONS:",
00067     "  --connect-to=<addr>  Connect to a client listening on <addr> (TCP only)."
00068     "  --help          Display this help text and exit",
00069     "  --port=<n>      Specifies the port to listen on (default=11255)",
00070     "  --app-queue     Use an application queue for handling requests",
00071     "  --reactors=<n>  Specifies the number of reactors (default=1)",
00072     "  --delay=<ms>    Specifies milliseconds to wait before echoing message (default=0)",
00073     "  --udp           Operate in UDP mode instead of TCP",
00074     "  --verbose,-v    Generate verbose output",
00075     ""
00076     "This is a sample program to test the AsyncComm library.  It establishes",
00077     "a connection with the sampleServer and sends each line of the input file",
00078     "to the server.  Each reply from the server is echoed to stdout.",
00079     (const char *)0
00080   };

00087   class RequestHandler : public ApplicationHandler {
00088   public:
00089 
00090     RequestHandler(Comm *comm, EventPtr &event_ptr) : ApplicationHandler(event_ptr), m_comm(comm) { return; }
00091 
00092     virtual void run() {
00093       m_header_builder.initialize_from_request(m_event_ptr->header);
00094       CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf(m_header_builder, m_event_ptr->message_len));
00095       cbp->append_bytes((uint8_t *)m_event_ptr->message, m_event_ptr->message_len);
00096       int error = m_comm->send_response(m_event_ptr->addr, cbp);
00097       if (error != Error::OK) {
00098         HT_ERRORF("Comm::send_response returned %s", Error::get_text(error));
00099       }
00100     }
00101   private:
00102     Comm *m_comm;
00103     HeaderBuilder m_header_builder;
00104   };
00105

00111   class Dispatcher : public DispatchHandler {
00112 
00113   public:
00114 
00115     Dispatcher(Comm *comm, ApplicationQueue *app_queue) : m_comm(comm), m_app_queue(app_queue) { return; }
00116 
00117     virtual void handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00118       if (g_verbose && event_ptr->type == Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00119         HT_INFO("Connection Established.");
00120       }
00121       else if (g_verbose && event_ptr->type == Event::DISCONNECT) {
00122         if (event_ptr->error != 0) {
00123           HT_INFOF("Disconnect : %s", Error::get_text(event_ptr->error));
00124         }
00125         else {
00126           HT_INFO("Disconnect.");
00127         }
00128       }
00129       else if (event_ptr->type == Event::ERROR) {
00130         HT_WARNF("Error : %s", Error::get_text(event_ptr->error));
00131       }
00132       else if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00133         if (m_app_queue == 0) {
00134           m_header_builder.initialize_from_request(event_ptr->header);
00135           CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf(m_header_builder, event_ptr->message_len));
00136           cbp->append_bytes((uint8_t *)event_ptr->message, event_ptr->message_len);
00137           if (g_delay > 0)
00138             poll(0, 0, g_delay);
00139           int error = m_comm->send_response(event_ptr->addr, cbp);
00140           if (error != Error::OK) {
00141             HT_ERRORF("Comm::send_response returned %s", Error::get_text(error));
00142           }
00143         }
00144         else
00145           m_app_queue->add(new RequestHandler(m_comm, event_ptr));
00146       }
00147     }
00148 
00149   private:
00150     Comm             *m_comm;
00151     ApplicationQueue *m_app_queue;
00152     HeaderBuilder     m_header_builder;
00153   };
00154

00161   class UdpDispatcher : public DispatchHandler {
00162   public:
00163 
00164     UdpDispatcher(Comm *comm) : m_comm(comm) { return; }
00165 
00166     virtual void handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00167       if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00168         m_header_builder.initialize_from_request(event_ptr->header);
00169         CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf(m_header_builder, event_ptr->message_len));
00170         cbp->append_bytes((uint8_t *)event_ptr->message, event_ptr->message_len);
00171         if (g_delay > 0)
00172           poll(0, 0, g_delay);
00173         int error = m_comm->send_datagram(event_ptr->addr, event_ptr->local_addr, cbp);
00174         if (error != Error::OK) {
00175           HT_ERRORF("Comm::send_response returned %s", Error::get_text(error));
00176         }
00177       }
00178       else {
00179         HT_ERRORF("Error : %s", event_ptr->to_str().c_str());
00180       }
00181     }
00182 
00183   private:
00184     Comm           *m_comm;
00185     HeaderBuilder   m_header_builder;
00186   };
00187

00193   class HandlerFactory : public ConnectionHandlerFactory {
00194   public:
00195     HandlerFactory(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) : m_dispatch_handler_ptr(dhp) { return; }
00196 
00197     virtual void get_instance(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00198       dhp = m_dispatch_handler_ptr;
00199     }
00200 
00201   private:
00202     DispatchHandlerPtr m_dispatch_handler_ptr;
00203   };
00204 
00205 }

00211 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00212   Comm *comm;
00213   int rval, error;
00214   uint16_t port = DEFAULT_PORT;
00215   int reactor_count = 2;
00216   ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr chfp;
00217   ApplicationQueue *app_queue = 0;
00218   bool udp = false;
00219   DispatchHandlerPtr dhp;
00220   struct sockaddr_in local_addr;
00221   struct sockaddr_in client_addr;
00222 
00223   memset(&client_addr, 0, sizeof(client_addr));
00224 
00225   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00226     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--help"))
00227       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00228     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--app-queue")) {
00229       app_queue = new ApplicationQueue(5);
00230     }
00231     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--connect-to=", 13)) {
00232       if (!InetAddr::initialize(&client_addr, &argv[i][13]))
00233         HT_ABORT;
00234     }
00235     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--port=", 7)) {
00236       rval = atoi(&argv[i][7]);
00237       if (rval <= 1024 || rval > 65535) {
00238         cerr << "Invalid port.  Must be in the range of 1024-65535." << endl;
00239         exit(1);
00240       }
00241       port = (uint16_t)rval;
00242     }
00243     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--reactors=", 11))
00244       reactor_count = atoi(&argv[i][11]);
00245     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--delay=", 8))
00246       g_delay = atoi(&argv[i][8]);
00247     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--udp"))
00248       udp = true;
00249     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--verbose") || !strcmp(argv[i], "-v"))
00250       g_verbose = true;
00251     else
00252       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00253   }
00254 
00255   System::initialize(System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]));
00256   ReactorFactory::initialize(reactor_count);
00257 
00258   comm = Comm::instance();
00259 
00260   if (g_verbose) {
00261     cout << "Listening on port " << port << endl;
00262     if (g_delay)
00263       cout << "Delay = " << g_delay << endl;
00264   }
00265 
00266   InetAddr::initialize(&local_addr, "localhost", port);
00267 
00268   if (!udp) {
00269     dhp = new Dispatcher(comm, app_queue);
00270 
00271     if (client_addr.sin_port != 0) {
00272       if ((error = comm->connect(client_addr, local_addr, dhp)) != Error::OK) {
00273         HT_ERRORF("Comm::connect error - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00274         exit(1);
00275       }
00276     }
00277     else {
00278       chfp = new HandlerFactory(dhp);
00279       comm->listen(local_addr, chfp, dhp);
00280     }
00281   }
00282   else {
00283     assert(client_addr.sin_port == 0);
00284     dhp = new UdpDispatcher(comm);
00285     comm->create_datagram_receive_socket(&local_addr, 0, dhp);
00286   }
00287 
00288   poll(0, 0, -1);
00289 
00290   return 0;
00291 }
